tool_description: Fast and Simple web search for emails - get emails found on the web for a given query and an email domain in real-time.
name: Email Search
title: Email Search

api_list.name: Search Emails
api_list.description: Search the web for emails using a query and email domain and get up to 5,000 email addresses.

required_parameters.name: email_domain
required_parameters.description: Email domain - typically a company domain (e.g. wsgr.com) or an email provider domain (e.g. gmail.com).

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description:
Search query.

`e.g.` *`steve smith san francisco ca usa`*
`e.g.` *`facebook ceo`*
`e.g.` *`jack blogger new york`*
`e.g.` *`car dealer california usa`*

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of emails to return. Accepts values from 1-5000.
**Default:** 5000
